message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
I'll take 60% and leave you with 40% for now. Let's see if you can do better next round.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still hoping for a 50/50 split. Don't get too comfortable with that 60%!
You're not budging, I'll take 70% this time. You'll have to make a better offer next round if you want to get more!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share. Don't think you can take all the money, though!
I'm not getting any softer. You're getting a smaller and smaller share, but I'll give you a tiny bit more for now. Don't expect it to last.
I'm making a last-ditch effort to get a decent share. Take it or leave it, Bob!
